welcome.title: Welcome to Letter River!
welcome.description: Letter River helps you learn letters through an interactive game. First, let's set up your languages!

appLanguage.title: Choose Your Interface Language
appLanguage.description: This sets the language for all menus, buttons, and instructions. Pick the language you're most comfortable reading.

practiceLanguage.title: Choose What to Learn
practiceLanguage.description: Select the language you want to practice! This determines which letters you'll see in the game.

confirmLanguages.title: Let's Get Started!
confirmLanguages.description: Click Continue when you're ready. You can always change these later in Settings.

navigation.title: Navigation
navigation.description: Use the bottom navigation to explore. Home shows your progress, Learn shows language info, Achievements shows badges, and Settings lets you customize.

progress.title: Your Progress
progress.description: Here you can track your streak, level, and latest badge. Each game you play earns stars to level up!

quests.title: Daily Quests
quests.description: Complete daily quests to earn bonus stars. Quests reset every day at midnight Jerusalem time.

navigateToAchievements.title: Let's Check Achievements!
navigateToAchievements.description: Let's see what badges you can earn. We'll navigate to the Achievements page now.

achievementsOverview.title: Your Badge Collection
achievementsOverview.description: Earn badges by completing challenges! Each badge tracks your accomplishments.

badgeTiers.title: Badge Tiers
badgeTiers.description: Each badge has Bronze, Silver, and Gold tiers. Complete harder goals to level up and earn more stars!

navigateToSettings.title: Customize Your Experience
navigateToSettings.description: Now let's visit Settings to see how you can tailor the game to your learning style.

settingsIntro.title: Settings & Accessibility
settingsIntro.description: Here you can customize how the game works to fit your needs. Everyone learns differently!

accessibilityOptions.title: Accessibility Features
accessibilityOptions.description: Adjust game speed, use dyslexia-friendly fonts, enable click mode instead of dragging, and much more. Try different settings to find what works best for you!

backToHome.title: Ready to Play?
backToHome.description: Great! Now let's head back home and start your first game.

playButton.title: Start Your First Game
playButton.description: Click the Play button below whenever you're ready to practice! We'll guide you through the game setup.

tourStart.title: Quick Tour
tourStart.description: Let's take a quick tour of Letter River! We'll visit each main section.

homeFeatures.title: Home Screen
homeFeatures.description: Track your progress, complete daily quests, and access the game from here.

tourAchievements.title: Achievements
tourAchievements.description: View all available badges and track your accomplishments.

tourSettings.title: Settings & Accessibility
tourSettings.description: Customize game speed, fonts, and accessibility options to match your learning style.

tourLearn.title: Learn
tourLearn.description: Browse language information and reference materials.

tourComplete.title: Tour Complete!
tourComplete.description: You've seen all the main features. Click the Play button anytime to start practicing!

setupIntro.title: Game Setup
setupIntro.description: Choose what to practice and set your goal before playing!

practiceModes.title: What to Practice
practiceModes.description: Select consonants, vowels, or combined letters. You can practice one type or mix them!

goalSetting.title: Set Your Goal
goalSetting.description: Use + and - to set the level you must beat to win a match. Start low if you're new, increase to improve!

startGame.title: Ready? Let's Play!
startGame.description: Click Start to begin! Letters will flow across the screen - drag each to its matching box at the bottom.
